participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and sociable, Emily is passionate about helping others and dreams of making a positive impact in people's lives.
participant_1.background: i won homecoming queen this year. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i'm currently in high school.

participant_2.personality: Frustrated yet resilient, Mark is seeking change in his life, balancing personal struggles with his professional responsibilities.
participant_2.background: i'm 40 years old. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman. i am planning on getting a divorce. i hate my job.
